title: 10 Steps to Upload High Res Photos to Facebook

steps.title: Go to https://www.facebook.com in a web browser.
steps.content: Go to https://www.facebook.com in a web browser. If you’re not already signed in to your account, enter your login details to do so now.

steps.title: Click your username.
steps.content: Click your username. It’s at the top of the screen toward the right edge. This opens your profile.

steps.title: Click Photos.
steps.content: Click Photos . It’s right below your cover image.

steps.title: Click + Create Album.
steps.content: Click + Create Album . It’s in the gray area above your existing photos. This opens your computer’s file browser.

steps.title: Navigate to the folder containing your high-resolution photos.
steps.content: Navigate to the folder containing your high-resolution photos.

steps.title: Select the photo(s) you want to upload.
steps.content: Select the photo(s) you want to upload. To select multiple photos, hold ⌘ Command (macOS) or Control (Windows) as you click each file.

steps.title: Click Open.
steps.content: Click Open . This shows a preview of the photos in the “Create Album” window.

steps.title: Type a name and description for the album.
steps.content: Type a name and description for the album. This information goes into the boxes at the top-left corner of the window.

steps.title: Check the box next to “High Quality.”
steps.content: Check the box next to “High Quality.” It’s under the “More Options” header in the left column.

steps.title: Click Post.
steps.content: Click Post . It’s at the bottom-right corner of the window. The selected photos will now be uploaded in a high-resolution format.
